title: HoldemX
author: HoldemX
content: HODL $Hold embodies the spirit of Texas Hold'em and the crypto world. As Holdem club's native token, it links players, eases transactions, rewards participation, and seamlessly integrates with our decentralized poker platform.Holdem with blockchain technology to create a decentralized and transparent gaming experience. Through the utilization of blockchain's immutability, transparency, and security, the project aims to revolutionize online poker by addressing challenges associated with traditional platforms.Each $Hold purchase on UniSwap gets you a 1% airdrop bonus in $HoldX, directly boosting your rewards.Burn 1 $HoldX in your wallet to unlock 1 $Hold from the discounted sale.Contract address:$Hold: 0xB031f83f279B61751862B8f5D65949519c3da95e$Holdx: 0x31C6bDE892A4e34aF957B9Ba93D481C209674D55
